template.name: timberm
template.description: Log method name and its arguments

variable.name: content
variable.expression: groovyScript("def params = _2.collect {it + ' = [%s]'}.join(', '); def params2 = _2.collect {it}.join(', '); return '\"' + _1 + '() called' + (params.empty ? '' : ' with: ' + params) + '\"' + (params2.empty ? '' : ', ' + params2)", methodName(), methodParameters())
